channel.title: Lost Ruins RSPS - [24/7] [Everything needed in a server] [Great XP] [X2 Weekend]
channel.description:
About:
We're a new 317 server that has just opened for everybody to play. Since we're brand new your suggestions and ideas are added to the game daily. I like to think this isn't "our" server instead its your server. Honestly I don't know what else to list here so lets cut to the chase.
[center]Features:[/center] [center]All skills are fully trainable Lagg free game play Save certain spots with up to 5 savable teleports! Easy to use interface system that allows for clean display of statistics and information Activate PvP anywhere Flawless Pking along with PvM 24/7 Up-time Prestige Any or All of Your Skills Loyalty rewards 4+ Mini-games Customizable Clan chats New & Proper Rs items such as Kiln Cape, Polypore Staff, Overloads & More Bank Tabs Npc's have Dialague Interactions Various Areas to train all of your skills Flawless Switches Awesome graphics Shitload of content Download and webclient! Staff spots currently OPEN (07/11/2013) You will enjoy this server since it has everything provided! [/center]
Links: Hope to see you in-game!
http://www.lostruinsrsps.com http://www.lostruinsrsps.com/forum

item.title: Lost Ruins RSPS - [24/7] [Everything needed in a server] [Great XP] [X2 Weekend]

item.description:
@rjayt98 wrote:

About:

We’re a new 317 server that has just opened for everybody to play. Since we’re brand new your suggestions and ideas are added to the game daily. I like to think this isn’t “our” server instead its your server. Honestly I don’t know what else to list here so lets cut to the chase.

[center]Features:[/center]
[center]All skills are fully trainable
Lagg free game play
Save certain spots with up to 5 savable teleports!
Easy to use interface system that allows for clean display of statistics and information
Activate PvP anywhere
Flawless Pking along with PvM
24/7 Up-time
Prestige Any or All of Your Skills
Loyalty rewards
4+ Mini-games
Customizable Clan chats
New & Proper Rs items such as Kiln Cape, Polypore Staff, Overloads & More
Bank Tabs
Npc’s have Dialague Interactions
Various Areas to train all of your skills
Flawless Switches
Awesome graphics
Shitload of content
Download and webclient!
Staff spots currently OPEN (07/11/2013)
You will enjoy this server since it has everything provided!
[/center]

Links: Hope to see you in-game!

http://www.lostruinsrsps.com
http://www.lostruinsrsps.com/forum
